name: All Around Me (Majed Remix) — Luna Orbit x Majed
description: Music NFT referencing the official audio for "All Around Me (Majed Remix)" by Luna Orbit, remixed by Majed, as distributed on YouTube via Label Engine. Released in 2025 via broke / Oury. This token is a collectible and does not grant copyright or commercial rights to the underlying music or artwork; all rights remain with the original creators, songwriters and labels.

attributes.value: Luna Orbit, Majed Majed, Master Produções Remix
